title: @Riot, Quick Cash Idea
body: Why doesn't Riot just sell champion splash arts as posters on the online store? 10 dollars for a single poster. I would have bought {{champion:40}}  {{champion:201}}  {{champion:143}}  {{champion:61}}  {{champion:16}}  {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}}  {{champion:21}} {{champion:432}}  {{champion:57}} posters already.

replies.body: I'd pay $20 for a Project Jhin poster. That one looks **_clean_**.
seriously...why is this not a thing already?

oh heck yeah, i'd shell out for some good posters. Screw this whole "well we have to make the game more unenjoyable for people because we need $$, smol indie company here at ritoto gams", give me P O S T E R S
Gimme PROJECT: Vayne and Death Sworn Zed rito pls.

Buy 10 posters to get a bonus chest and key :P
Edit: You should Request 1% of the profit
I see you have better taste than the others here like me. :^)
I've seen easel posters of various LoL splashes at my local game cafe. So they're out there
